TRACKTOALBUM_DOC: Play the album of the currently playing track. To use with lircrc add config = node /data/plugins/miscellanea/randomizer/trackToAlbum
RANDOMALBUM_DOC: Load and play a random Album. To use with lircrc add config = node /data/plugins/miscellanea/randomizer/randomAlbum
RANDOMTRACKS_DOC: Load and play random tracks. To use with lircrc add config = node /data/plugins/miscellanea/randomizer/randomTracks
TRACKS_DOC: Select the number of random tracks to load -the  default is 25
